name: Run Cube (Beta)
description:
You are playing for the pink cube! Your goal is to get out of the box! Attention, the office may vary!

The game is made according to the video tutorial Maxter.

This is my first project!

Controls:

W-forward

S-back

A-left

D-right

I-skip 10 levels

U-skip 5 levels

Q-skip level

Y-back for 10 levels

T-back 5 levels

E-to return to the level

R-reset level

Attention! Sometimes, the management of change for variety!
